QuestionText: What is the primary purpose of a central bank in an economy?
OptionB: Controlling the money supply and interest rates

QuestionText: Which of the following best describes 'Real GDP'?
OptionB: GDP measured at current market prices

OptionA: The monetary cost of a product
OptionB: The cost of the next best alternative forgone
OptionC: The total time spent producing a good

QuestionText: Which economist is most closely associated with the theory of 'Keynesian Economics'?
What does the Consumer Price Index (CPI) measure?
OptionA: Changes in the price of industrial goods
OptionB: Changes in the price of a basket of consumer goods and services

QuestionText: Which of the following is a tool of monetary policy used by central banks?

OptionA: Taking a larger percentage of income from high-income groups
OptionB: Taking a smaller percentage of income from high-income groups
OptionC: Taking the same percentage of income from all groups
OptionD: Being applied only to corporate profits
